RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 1 220 Y Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Purse 5600. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. (No Sex Allowance).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMA KNIGHT straight and strong. MISS SPECIAL TRAITS brushed early, no bid. SNIPPY KAREN SUE brushed early, outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Special Traits
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed early, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Snippy Karen Sue
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed early, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Knight
ENTRY.COMMENT: straight and strong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 9500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2021 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOW DOSE hopped at the start and lost about three lengths to the field, hustled to stalk the pace, moved alongside after three furlongs, dueled two wide to the stretch then edged away in the latter stages. HEY WILMAAA had the best speed, set the pace, was collared by the winner nearing the second turn, was getting outkicked in upper stretch then had the rider lose his right iron a sixteenth out and had enough of a cushion to hold second. FANTASTIC SECRET chased the top two to the stretch while two wide then could not impact the top two. TAKES A VILLAGE stalked the pace early, was outkicked on the backstretch then saved ground to no avail. BANDON BRIDGE had no speed and was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Takes a Village
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, saved ground, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Fantastic Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 2wide, lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Wilmaaa
ENTRY.COMMENT: best speed, set pace, collared, lost iron 1/16, saved 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Low Dose
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, pushed to stalk, dueled 2wide, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Bandon Bridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 8000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $3,200 (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races For $2,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SASQUATCH RIDE checked into the first turn, pushed up to duel BIG BAD BRIAN and MR BOTANICALS into the second turn, crowded BIG BAD BRIAN then came off the rail, bumped MR BOTANICALS into the stretch, carried that one out then dug in to prevail. MR BOTANICALS was slow to find a good stride, hustled along to gain on the leaders, was outside SASQUATCH RIDE on the second turn, got bumped into the stretch then was carried out some and settled for second. BIG BAD BRIAN set the pace to the backstretch, was collared by the top two while inside, got crowded by SASQUATCH RIDE while tiring into the second turn, took up and finished evenly. AMANDA'S BEACH BOY had no speed and was not a factor. The stewards conducted an inquiry into the race and disqualified SASQUATCH RIDE for interfering with both MR BOTANICALS and BIG BAD BRIAN and placed him third. It was a unanimous decision.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Sasquatch Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked 1st turn, dueled, crowded foe 1/2p, bumped foe stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Amanda's Beach Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Botanicals
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow to settle, hustled, carried out, bumped stretch, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bad Brian
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, tiring, crowded, steadied 2d turn, even stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAD BOD hustled to the front, was clear on the first turn, responded to urging and was ridden out to the line. OBVIOUS hopped in the air at the start, chased the winner three wide to the stretch and bested the others. SHOCKAZULU had no speed, raced three wide to the stretch but was not a threat. HOLYJAZZ also hopped at the start, got outsprinted, saved ground but was never a factor. MR MEMPHIS chased the winner in the two path for a half mile then weakened. STANLEY RYDER was outsprinted, raced two wide throughout and gave way in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Shockazulu
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 3wide, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Stanley Ryder
ENTRY.OWNER: Beckner Teri L and Gallus Bjorn M
ENTRY.COMMENT: outsprinted, 2wide trip, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Memphis
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, off rail, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Holyjazz
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, outsprinted, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Obvious
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, chased, 3wide, 2d best

ENTRY.NAME: Dad Bod
ENTRY.COMMENT: best speed, clear, ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVIERA SUNRISE was never far back, bid three wide on the far turn, rallied up to engage for the lead and dug in determinedly to hold off BLUSHING BAY late. BLUSHING BAY had no speed, was fanned four wide while outside the winner to the stretch, responded in the drive but could not get by. BETHEL RIDGE dueled for the lead from the rail for five furlongs, dug in when set down but was overtaken and weakened late. DRAW ME bobbled a bit at the start, had no speed, bid between rivals on the far turn to loom a threat then flattened out late. MIDNIGHT SYMPHONY attended the pace two wide for a half mile, was outkicked on the far turn and weakened in the drive. SHESAIDSHESPERFECT was also in good position while pressing the action to the far turn but tired after five furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Bethel Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, saved ground, dug in, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Symphony
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended pace, off rail, outkicked stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Draw Me
ENTRY.OWNER: Eaton Terri Gibson Joe H Sahud Jacqueline and Sahud Mervyn
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, no speed, roused 2wide, gaining, flattened late

ENTRY.NAME: Blushing Bay
ENTRY.OWNER: Padilla Andres and Flores De La Torre Teresa
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, fanned 4wide, rallied, nipped

ENTRY.NAME: Shesaidshesperfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, pressed pace, tired far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Riviera Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, roused 3wide, responded, dueled, got nod

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 7000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARNING SOUND rated off the leaders for three furlongs, rallied three then four wide to the stretch and closed steadily to prevail. SAINT HELEN set the pace, turned back HEAVENS TO BETSY on the second turn but could not stall the winner. HEAVENS TO BETSY pressed the pace two wide to the second turn, offered a bid to almost draw alongside but could not sustain that run and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Warning Sound
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated kindly, shifted out, rallied 3-4wide, steady urging

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Helen
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, met bid 2d turn, caught, 2d best

ENTRY.NAME: Heavens to Betsy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bid 2wide, tired stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIR LAUGHALOT broke straight in the air and lost about seven or eight lengths at the start, trailed for three furlongs then commenced a bid into the second turn, rallied with a stout run in the stretch and got up in the last jump. XTRAFINE XTINA dueled for the lead from the outset, inched away on the second turn, dug in determinedly late but was nailed on the line. RUN FACTOR hustled to attend the pace three wide to the second turn, was outkicked to the stretch then lacked the needed closing response. LIVE A GOOD LIFE chased the pace three wide to the backstretch then made a bid inside on the second turn to briefly loom a threat but weakened in the drive. STARBOARD LIST chased the pace two wide for three furlongs then tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Starboard List
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 2wide, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Run Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, pace 3wide, outkicked, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Live a Good Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, rail rally 2d turn, flattened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Laughalot
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, trailed, advanced 2d turn, stout rally, gamely

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. & Mrs. William T. Gray DVM

ENTRY.NAME: Xtrafine Xtina
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, responded 2d turn, dug in determinedly, nailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 9800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MASTER RECOVERY was unhurried for five eighths, swung out four wide while rallying on the far turn then pushed to the front and won going away. TRABIESO AVELITO had no speed, settled for a half mile, checked off heels into the far turn then shifted four wide, rallied willingly and was second best. EFFECTIVE GIG chased for a half mile, bid two wide and pushed to duel into the stretch but weakened in the final sixteenth. ANTICIPATED attended the pace two wide for five furlongs then was overtaken and weakened. DANZ TILL TEN bobbled at the start then had no speed and was never a threat. ZOE'S PAPA CEE showed good speed, dueled from the rail for five furlongs but tired thereafter. SMOKIN KEN broke slow, was never a factor and lugged out six wide on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Zoe's Papa Cee
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed, dueled rail, tired stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Master Recovery
ENTRY.OWNER: Beckner Teri L and Gallus Bjorn M
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, swung 4wide, rallied, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Danz Till Ten
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, no speed, 2wide, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Effective Gig
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, bid 2wide, rallied, dueled, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Smokin Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow, no factor, lugged 6wide far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Anticipated
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended pace, 2wide, collared, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Trabieso Avelito
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, settled, checked 5/8s, shifted 4wide, steady bid 2d
